prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with sleek blue scales and a sharp, toothy grin.
Imagine a fierce shark Pokemon that thrives in oceanic depths, showcasing vibrant colors.
Design an aquatic predator with striking yellow accents and a streamlined body for speed.
Generate a Pokemon resembling a shark, boasting a menacing appearance and a powerful tail.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the sea with fierce features and deep colors.
Make a Pokemon with a combination of blue and white, perfect for ocean battles.
Give me a design of a fierce shark Pokemon with unique patterns and a dynamic pose.
